properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A stunning luxury apartment located close to all amenities of Finchley Road and West Hampstead. The property is situated on the ground floor of a modern development and boasts a large reception room with stylish open plan kitchen, two well proportioned double bedrooms and two bathrooms (one en-suite). Offered chain free.
properties.location: The Cascades, Finchley Road, London, NW3

properties.description: Discover an exceptional, Grade II Listed, seven bedroom family home, beautifully reimagined for modern living while retaining its timeless heritage. Originally built by the esteemed C.H.B. Quennell, this magnificent property sits behind a gated carriage driveway with a garage, exuding elegance and grandeur.

Spacious and well maintained detached Six Bedroom Chalet Bungalow with Off Street Parking and the potential for Seven Bedrooms. Located close to Goodmayes, Seven Kings & Barking Stations plus Schools, Parks, Local Amenities & Transport links.

This opulent duplex penthouse benefits from a feature staircase, bespoke bathrooms, kitchen, steam room and a second indoor/outdoor kitchen-bar area for entertaining. Glazed folding doors lead to an expansive private terrace and hot tub, allowing residents to relax and unwind while enjoying spectacular views across the city.
properties.location: Woodhouse Lane, Leeds, West Yorkshire, LS1

properties.description: An incredibly rare and unique development opportunity for a purchaser to create their very own family home from new. Full planning permission has been granted (planning reference : 24/06560/FU ) for the construction of a five bedroom, five bathroom detached home circa 6000sqft being set over three floors.
properties.location: Wike Ridge Lane, Leeds, West Yorkshire
